item.title: Network upgrade part 1: TrueNAS SCALE
item.description: There’s been many changes in my internal network in the past few months. For several years I’ve wanted to build a NAS in order to start self-hosting more and more things and rely less on the “cloud”, and finally did so. I bought a setup as follows: Case: Fractal Design Define 7 (lots of space for HDDs) Motherboard: Asrock Z790 Pro RS/D4 (mostly because of the crazy amount of 8 sata ports, making it so I don’t have to buy any SATA expansion cards yet.
